meanings.definition: A vegetable with curly green or purple leaves.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating kales in my salad.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested fresh kales from the garden.
meanings.sent3: The kales danced in the wind as if they were having a party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like kales in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The kales looked like miniature green umbrellas swaying in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A type of cabbage with smooth leaves.
meanings.sent1: Mom bought some kales to make a delicious soup.
meanings.sent2: The market had a special on kales this week.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns under the kales.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as a bed of kales.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cooking kales filled the kitchen with warmth.
